column4: please don't recommend windows apps for tasks where there are plenty linux apps
I have problems burning img in brasero :) I guess there is a workaround, but I like imgburn too much
I don't want to tell you what you should/not do on your machine :-)  my concern was the recommendation in this channel
I'd say it's just to emphasize that it's the source code for the binary, not some other form of "source"
